tickDuration.description: The time of the last simulation (last tick).

tickNumber.description: The number of steps in the simulation.

tripOverhead.description: The actual duration of a trip versus the theoretical case where routing is performed based only on static map dataâ€”length and maximum speed of each street.

routeRandomSigma.description: The randomization sigma of edge weights.

explorationPercentage.description: The percentage of routes we want to use for exploration.

maxSpeedAndLengthFactor.description: How much the length/speed influences the routing.

averageEdgeDurationFactor.description: How much the averageEdgeFactor influences the routing.

freshnessUpdateFactor.description: How much the freshnessUpdateFactor influences the routing.

freshnessCutOffValue.description: If data is older than this we do not consider it in the algorithm.

reRouteEveryTicks.description: Check for a new route every x times after the car starts.

numberOfCars.description: Total number of cars in the simulation.
